plugin_desc: Collects key metrics of the Minio object storage system, including runtime status, storage capacity, usage, replication, inter-node communication, and S3 requests, enabling real-time monitoring of storage health, performance optimization, and anomaly detection.
name: Minio

metrics.name: minio_audit_failed_messages_counter
metrics.description: Counts unsent messages to detect sending failures and ensure message delivery integrity.

metrics.name: minio_audit_target_queue_length_gauge
metrics.description: Reflects message backlog in target queue for optimizing message processing.

metrics.name: minio_audit_total_messages_counter
metrics.description: Evaluates sending success rate with unsent messages to measure stability.

metrics.name: minio_audit_delivery_success_rate
metrics.description: The success rate of sending messages is used to measure the reliability and stability of audit message sending.

metrics.name: minio_cluster_capacity_usable_free_bytes_gauge
metrics.description: Reflects available storage for data storage planning.

metrics.name: minio_cluster_capacity_usable_total_bytes_gauge
metrics.description: Counts used storage for calculating utilization rate.

metrics.name: minio_cluster_capacity_storage_utilization
metrics.description: Collect statistics on the percentage of used capacity in the cluster storage capacity to the total capacity, monitor the storage resource usage, and evaluate the remaining storage resources.

metrics.name: minio_cluster_drive_offline_total_gauge
metrics.description: Counts offline drives to troubleshoot issues affecting performance and data availability.

metrics.name: minio_cluster_drive_online_total_gauge
metrics.description: Evaluates available storage devices to ensure cluster operation.

metrics.name: minio_cluster_drive_total_gauge
metrics.description: Evaluates overall storage device status with online and offline counts.

metrics.name: minio_cluster_drive_offline_rate
metrics.description: The ratio of the number of offline drives to the total number of drives, a measure of the reliability and availability of storage devices, can affect data redundancy when thresholds such as 5% are exceeded.

metrics.name: minio_cluster_nodes_offline_total_gauge
metrics.description: Counts offline nodes to address issues affecting performance and redundancy.

metrics.name: minio_cluster_nodes_online_total_gauge
metrics.description: Evaluates available cluster resources to ensure service capacity.

metrics.name: minio_cluster_nodes_offline_rate
metrics.description: The percentage of the number of offline nodes in the total number of nodes reflects the health status of the cluster nodes and is used to evaluate the stability of the cluster nodes.

metrics.name: minio_cluster_write_quorum_gauge
metrics.description: Ensures data write consistency and reliability, affecting write performance.

metrics.name: minio_cluster_health_status_gauge
metrics.description: Reflects overall cluster health for quick status check.

metrics.name: minio_s3_traffic_sent_bytes_rate
metrics.description: Calculates the average rate of data sent in S3 requests over the past 5 minutes, reflecting data upload performance.

metrics.name: minio_s3_traffic_received_bytes_rate
metrics.description: Calculates the average rate of data received in S3 requests over the past 5 minutes, reflecting data download performance.

metrics.name: minio_s3_requests_waiting_total_gauge
metrics.description: Displays the number of S3 requests waiting to be processed, optimizes request processing efficiency, and directly reflects whether the system is saturated.

metrics.name: minio_s3_requests_total_rate
metrics.description: Calculates the average processing rate of S3 requests over the last 5 minutes, reflecting system throughput and service load and performance baselines.

metrics.name: minio_s3_requests_errors_total_rate
metrics.description: Calculates the average rate of errors in S3 requests over the past 5 minutes, reflecting system stability.

metrics.name: minio_s3_requests_rejected_invalid_total_rate
metrics.description: Calculates the average rate of S3 requests rejected due to invalid format or parameters over the past 5 minutes, reflecting client request quality.

metrics.name: minio_s3_requests_rejected_auth_total_rate
metrics.description: Calculates the average rate of S3 requests rejected due to authentication failures over the past 5 minutes, reflecting authentication issues.

metrics.name: minio_bucket_usage_object_total_gauge
metrics.description: Statistics on the number of objects in a specified bucket are used to understand the data scale of the bucket and evaluate the bucket usage.

metrics.name: minio_bucket_usage_total_bytes_gauge
metrics.description: Statistics on the amount of storage space occupied by a specified bucket can be used to monitor storage resource consumption and plan storage capacity.

metrics.name: minio_bucket_requests_4xx_errors_total_rate
metrics.display_name: Total Bucket S3 Request Error Rate (4xx)
metrics.description: The rate per second of client errors (e.g., 403/404) in S3 requests received by the bucket over the past 5 minutes, reflecting the real-time frequency of client request legitimacy issues.

metrics.name: minio_bucket_requests_inflight_total_gauge
metrics.description: Statistics on the number of S3 requests processed by a specified bucket can be used to monitor the request processing progress and optimize system performance.

metrics.name: minio_bucket_requests_total_rate
metrics.description: The growth rate per second of the total number of S3 requests received by a bucket reflects the intensity of request traffic and the frequency of business access to the bucket.

metrics.name: minio_bucket_traffic_received_rate
metrics.description: The average amount of data traffic received by the compute bucket per second over a 5-minute period, converted to MB/s units, is used to monitor bandwidth usage for data downloads or reads.

metrics.name: minio_node_drive_total_inodes_gauge
metrics.description: Counts the total number of inodes on a specified drive to measure its file - storage capacity limit and evaluate the scale of storage resources.

metrics.name: minio_node_drive_used_inodes_utilization
metrics.description: Statistics on the percentage of inodes used by a specified drive can be used to understand the degree of drive usage and assist in storage resource management.

metrics.name: minio_node_drive_reads_per_sec_gauge
metrics.description: Counts the number of read operations per second on a specified drive to evaluate its read performance and troubleshoot read - related performance issues.

metrics.name: minio_node_drive_reads_kb_per_sec_gauge
metrics.description: Counts the amount of data read per second (in kilobytes) on a specified drive, directly reflecting its read bandwidth to optimize data - reading strategies.

metrics.name: minio_node_drive_writes_per_sec_gauge
metrics.description: Counts the number of write operations per second on a specified drive to evaluate its write performance and analyze the impact of write operations on the system.

metrics.name: minio_node_drive_writes_kb_per_sec_gauge
metrics.description: Counts the amount of data written per second (in kilobytes) on a specified drive, reflecting its write bandwidth to improve data - writing efficiency.

metrics.name: minio_node_drive_perc_util_gauge
metrics.description: Counts the percentage of time a specified drive is busy to evaluate its load and allocate storage tasks reasonably.

metrics.name: minio_node_if_rx_bytes_rate
metrics.display_name: The amount of data received per second
metrics.description: Statistics on the amount of data received per second by a specified server network interface in the past five minutes are used to monitor network traffic inflow and evaluate network bandwidth usage.

metrics.name: minio_node_if_rx_errors_rate
metrics.description: Statistics on the number of errors that occur when receiving data per second on a specified server network interface in the past 5 minutes is used to troubleshoot network receiving faults and ensure network data transmission quality.

metrics.name: minio_node_if_tx_bytes_rate
metrics.display_name: The amount of data transferred per second
metrics.description: Statistics on the amount of data transmitted per second on a specified server network interface in the past five minutes are used to monitor network traffic outflow and evaluate network bandwidth efficiency.

metrics.name: minio_node_if_tx_errors_rate
metrics.description: Statistics on the number of errors that occur during data transmission per second on the network interface of a specified server in the past 5 minutes are used to troubleshoot network transmission faults and improve network communication reliability.

metrics.name: minio_node_cpu_avg_load1_gauge
metrics.description: Calculate the average load of the CPU in the past 1 minute, reflecting the number of processes waiting for CPU resources (including running and waiting processes), the larger the value, the more CPU tension, for real-time monitoring of real-time pressure and detection of performance problems.

metrics.name: minio_node_cpu_avg_load5_gauge
metrics.description: Calculate the average CPU load over the past 5 minutes, reflecting the number of processes waiting for CPU resources (including running and waiting processes), which is used to evaluate short-term load trends and assist in performance optimization decisions.

metrics.name: minio_node_cpu_avg_load15_gauge
metrics.description: The average CPU load in the past 15 minutes is calculated, reflecting the number of processes waiting for CPU resources (including running and waiting processes), which is used to analyze the long-term load and plan system resources.
